open.title: MetroFibre Outage |  New Germany
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting New Germany, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Due to the ongoing threats and vandalism, Metrofibre have made the difficult decision to suspend repairs in this area until further notice. This decision has been made to prioritise the safety of their employees and contractors, who have been facing violent threats and safety concerns. Metrofibre is continuing to monitor the situation and will resume repairs in the area as soon as it is safe to do so.

closed.resolution: Eskom have finished repairs and power has been restored.

updates.content: Service has been restored with an interim power solution to the power outage. Please note services may still be at risk until the power outage is resolved by Eskom.
